name: tiff
description: A library that supports the manipulation of TIFF image files

jpeg.description: Support JPEG compression in TIFF image files

lzma.description: Support LZMA compression in TIFF image files

webp.description: Support WEBP compression in TIFF image files

zip.description: Support ZIP/deflate compression in TIFF image files

zstd.description: Support ZSTD compression in TIFF image files
